metadata.title: CVE-2007-6758 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Server-side request forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in feed-proxy.php in extjs5.0.0.

criterions.comment: libjs-extjs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
icinga-web: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
htmlunit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
